mapper.update: UPDATE event SET name=#{name}, event_type_id=#{event_type_id}, imgname=#{imgname}, start_date=#{start_date}, end_date=#{end_date} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ev.name as event_name, et.name as type_name, ev.imgname, ev.start_date, ev.end_date FROM event ev INNER JOIN event_type et ON ev.event_type_id = et.id WHERE ev.name = #{name};
